line: Home isn’t where you land; home is where you launch. You can’t pick your home any more than you can choose your family. In poker, you get five cards. Three of them you can swap out, but two are yours to keep: family and native land.
author: Tayari Jones

line: To choose doubt as a philosophy of life is akin to choosing immobility as a means of transportation.
author: Yann Martel

line: The gods grow jealous of too much contentment anywhere, and they show their displeasure all of a sudden.
author: R. K. Narayan

line: I was within and without, simultaneously enchanted and repelled by the inexhaustible variety of life
author: F Scott Fitzgerald

line: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
book: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer’s Stone
author: J.K. Rowling

line: What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though.
author: J.D. Salinger
